publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3592.1 Sarah Boyack: Every Penny Counts for Mature Students—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3592) in the name of Mike Pringle, insert at end “and further notes that the “Every Penny Counts” campaign also calls on the Minister for Transport and Telecommunications to take action, given that mature students are an integral part of the Scottish Executive’s lifelong learning strategy.”
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Mark Ballard*
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Robin Harper*, Dr Elaine Murray*

S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Shiona Baird*, Eleanor Scott*, Maureen Macmillan*, Jackie Baillie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Marlyn Glen*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Marilyn Livingstone*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Trish Godman*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Cathy Peattie*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Mr Mark Ruskell*
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Janis Hughes*
S2M-3592.1 Every Penny Counts for Mature Students (lodged on 23 November 2005) Karen Whitefield*
